snippet.title: Adventures in Lestoria Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming March 30th, experience the first chapter of Adventures in Lestoria...

In this action dungeon-crawling RPG experience, you take on the role of a fighter: Explore and travel through the lands and surrounding countries of Lestoria in search of adventure!

Your quest begins in search of slimes in a nearby forest to restock on potion-making supplies, to soon discover that bandits have attacked the locals and have caused hysteria and chaos. Who would do such an awful thing, and can you put an end to their crimes?

Wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2894970/Adventures_in_Lestoria/
Itch.io: https://sigonasr2.itch.io/adventures-in-lestoria
Discord: https://discord.gg/RmM3k7Zbb2
Community Forums: https://forums.lestoria.net
Mailing List: https://lestoria.net

Created with the amazing olcPixelGameEngine! olcPixelGameEngine Copyright © 2018-2024 OneLoneCoder.com

Adventures in Lestoria Copyright © 2024 Sig Productions
